text: Hong Nam-ki (; born 29 July 1960) is a South Korean politician. He was the Minister of Economy and Finance and Deputy Prime Minister of South Korea under President Moon Jae-in from November 2018 to May 2022. In April 2021, Hong became the Acting Prime Minister following the resignation of Chung Sye-kyun. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Hong Nam-ki
